price: 59. (Dikatakan kepada mereka), “Ini rombongan besar (pengikut-pengikutmu) yang masuk berdesak-desakan bersama kamu (ke neraka).” Tidak ada ucapan selamat datang bagi mereka karena sesungguhnya mereka akan masuk neraka, (kata pemimpin-pemimpin mereka).
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
